SEARCH
Package lt.viko.eif.stermen.project1.utility

Class JaxbUtility

java.lang.Object
lt.viko.eif.stermen.project1.utility.JaxbUtility
public final class JaxbUtility extends Object
A utility that allows the marshalling and unmarshalling of mapped classes to and from XML format.

      public static void setReader(StringReader reader)

    • getXsdSchema

      public static String getXsdSchema()

    • setXsdSchema

      public static void setXsdSchema(String xsdSchema)
      If an .xsd schema exists for the object tree it should be provided with this method. Further marshalling and unmarshalling will be validated with the provided schema.
      Parameters:
      xsdSchema - file location of .xsd schema relative to the programs execution location.

    • getFilepath

      public static String getFilepath()

    • setFilepath

      public static void setFilepath(String filepath)

    • setContext

      public static void setContext(Class cl)
      Sets the context class for all marshalling and unmarshalling methods.
      Parameters:
      cl - class type

    • setOutputType

      public static void setOutputType(JaxbUtilityOutputType type)
      Sets the output type by specifying the JaxbUtilityOutputType.
      Parameters:
      type - enum type of Console, StringWriter, File.

    • printXml

      public static void printXml()
      Prints the currently stored object in .xml format if it exists.

    • transformToXML

      public static void transformToXML(Object obj)
      Marshal object to .xml format. Validates the object if a .xsd schema is provided. Outputs based on the outputType selected. Console - prints output to console. StringWriter - stores output to writer. File - stores output to file. filepath property must be specified.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be marshalled.

    • transformToPOJO

      public static <T> T transformToPOJO(Class<T> obj)
      Unmarshal class from .xml format to an object. Validates the object if a .xsd schema is provided. Outputs based on the outputType selected. Console - no implemented. StringWriter - reads from writer. File - reads from file. filepath property must be specified.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of object to be returned - based on class type.
      Parameters:
      obj - provide class type of object that was marshalled.
      Returns:
      transform XML to Object and that object.
